description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application named ticketmetricsapibackend. It includes basic endpoints for greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for greeting, documentation, health, and info for the ticketmetricsapibackend application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when accessing the root URL.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple string indicating the application's health status.
